automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_7am_daily'
alias: Office WLED - 7 AM On Daily
description: "Turn on the Office WLED strip every day at 7:00 AM at a consistent brightness and neutral blue color."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '07:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 160
      rgb_color:
        - 80
        - 140
        - 255
